channel.title: Unit Testing :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Unit Testing Some of the lab assignments in CIS 300 use a technique called unit testing for testing the correctness of your code. Unit testing is an automated technique for testing individual public methods and properties using a pre-defined set of test cases. We will be using an open-source unit-testing framework called NUnit. An NUnit test suite is a separate project contained within the same solution as the project it is to test.
